page: AG60134: Tea Science And Process Technology

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction, soil and environmental requirement, planting materials and varieties, biotechnology of tea, nursery management, planting methods, fertilization, irrigation and drainage, shade tree, plant protection measures, chemistry of tea, processing, manufacturing, grading and packaging, tea industry and trade
